mapper.select: select nid, ntitle, ncontent, nfile, nsfile, to_char(ndate, 'yy/mm/dd') ndate, nhits from cgv_notice where nid = #{nid}
mapper.update: update cgv_notice set ntitle=#{ntitle}, ncontent=#{ncontent}, nfile=#{nfile}, nsfile=#{nsfile} where nid=#{nid}
update cgv_notice set nhits=nhits+1 where nid =#{nid}
